

   --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
              README file for LibSass Host Native for Windows x86 v1.3.2

   --------------------------------------------------------------------------------

           Copyright (c) 2015-2020 Andrey Taritsyn - http://www.taritsyn.ru


   ===========
   DESCRIPTION
   ===========
   This package complements the LibSassHost package and contains the native
   implementation of LibSass version 3.6.4 for Windows (x86).

   =============
   RELEASE NOTES
   =============
   Fixed a error #43 “application o virtual directory”.

   ============
   PROJECT SITE
   ============
   http://github.com/Taritsyn/LibSassHost
